name: Notion Dream Journal
description: Uncover the hidden meanings of your dreams with Dream Journal, a comprehensive Notion template. Designed to help you capture the essence of your dreams by summarising their setting, characters, events, and significant details or symbols. Categorise your dreams into different dream types, identify the emotions or moods you experienced, and even favourite dreams for future reference.Features:Streamlined dream logging with organised sectionsCategorisation of dream types such as epic dreams, nightma
features: Streamlined dream logging with organised sections; Categorisation of dream types such as epic dreams, nightmares, healing dreams, and more; Emotion and mood tracking to understand the emotional landscape of your dreams; Custom gallery covers for a calming and personalised experience; An intuitive layout to inspire reflection and self-discovery
